00044 bool ResourceManager::Init(NiStream* stream, NiRenderer* renderer)
00045 {
00046         bool bSuccess = false;
00047 
00048         // load models
00049         bSuccess = LoadNif(stream, string("models/bee2.nif"), RES_MODEL_BEE);
00050         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00051         bSuccess = LoadNif(stream, string("models/queen4.nif"), RES_MODEL_QUEEN);
00052         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00053         bSuccess = LoadNif(stream, string("models/enemy1.nif"), RES_MODEL_LOCUST);
00054         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00055 
00056         // load fonts
00057         bSuccess = LoadFont(string("fonts/trebuchet.nff"), renderer, RES_FONT_SELECTEDSOLDIERS);
00058         if (!bSuccess) return false;
00059 
00060         // load sounds
00061         //bSuccess = SoundManager::Get()->Init();
00062         //if (!bSuccess) return false;
00063 
00064         //bSuccess = LoadSound(string("sounds/bee4.mp3"), 
00065         //RES_SOUND_BEE); 
00066         //if (!bSuccess) return false;
00067 
00068 
00069         return bSuccess;
00070         
00071 }

00080 NiNodePropPtr ResourceManager::GetNodeProp(ResourceType type)
00081 {
00082         NiNodePropPtr nodeProp;
00083         if (m_tResourcesModels.GetAt(type, nodeProp))
00084         {
00085                 NiCloningProcess kCloning;
00086                 
00087                 NiNodePtr node = (NiNode*)nodeProp->m_spNode->Clone(kCloning);
00088                 NiPhysXPropPtr prop = (NiPhysXProp*)nodeProp->m_spProp->Clone(kCloning);
00089                 
00090                 return NiNew NiNodeProp(node, prop);
00091         }
00092         
00093         return 0;
00094 }

00103 NiNodePtr ResourceManager::GetNode(ResourceType type)
00104 {
00105         NiNodePropPtr nodeProp;
00106         if (m_tResourcesModels.GetAt(type, nodeProp))
00107         {
00108                 return (NiNode*)nodeProp->m_spNode->Clone();
00109         }
00110         
00111         return 0;
00112 }

00139 SoundPtr ResourceManager::GetSound(ResourceType type)
00140 {
00141         SoundDescPtr soundDesc;
00142         if (m_tResourcesSounds.GetAt(type, soundDesc))
00143         {
00144                 SoundPtr sound = SoundManager::Get()->CreateSound(soundDesc);
00145                 return sound;
00146         }
00147         
00148         return 0;

00160 bool ResourceManager::LoadNif(NiStream* stream, 
00161                                                           const string& filename, 
00162                                                           ResourceType type)
00163 {
00164         if (!stream) return false;
00165 
00166         bool bSuccess = stream->Load(
00167                 NiApplication::ConvertMediaFilename(filename.c_str()));
00168     
00169     if (!bSuccess)
00170     {
00171                 string error(" could not be loaded");
00172                 error = filename + error;
00173                 NiMessageBox(error.c_str(), "NIF Error");
00174                 return false;
00175     }
00176 
00177         NiNodePtr node = 0;
00178         NiPhysXPropPtr prop = 0;
00179         for (unsigned int i=0; i<stream->GetObjectCount(); i++)
00180         {
00181                 NiObject* pkObject = 0;
00182                 pkObject = stream->GetObjectAt(i);
00183                 if (NiIsKindOf(NiPhysXProp, pkObject))
00184                 {
00185                         prop = (NiPhysXProp*)pkObject;
00186                         prop->SetAllDestInterp(true);
00187             prop->SetAllSrcInterp(true);
00188                         
00189                 }
00190                 else if (NiIsKindOf(NiNode, pkObject))
00191                 {
00192                         node = (NiNode*)pkObject;
00193                 }
00194         }
00195         
00196         NiNodePropPtr newNode = NiNew NiNodeProp(node, prop);
00197         m_tResourcesModels.SetAt(type, newNode);
00198 
00199         return true;
00200         
00201 }

00212 bool ResourceManager::LoadFont(const std::string &filename, NiRenderer* renderer, 
00213                                                            ResourceType type)
00214 {
00215         NiFontPtr font = NiFont::Create(renderer, 
00216                 NiApplication::ConvertMediaFilename(filename.c_str()));
00217         if (font)
00218         {
00219                 m_tResourcesFonts.SetAt(type, font);
00220                 return true;
00221         }
00222         else
00223         {
00224                 string error(" could not be loaded");
00225                 error = filename + error;
00226                 NiMessageBox(error.c_str(), "NIF Error");
00227                 return false;
00228         }
00229         
00230 }
00231 //------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
00240 bool ResourceManager::LoadSound(const std::string& filename, ResourceType type)
00241 {
00242         const char *convertedFilename = NiApplication::ConvertMediaFilename(filename.c_str());
00243         ifstream f;
00244         f.open(convertedFilename, ifstream::in);
00245         f.close();
00246         if (f.fail())
00247         {
00248                 string err("Error sound: " + filename + " was not found");
00249                 NiMessageBox(err.c_str(), "Error");
00250                 return false;
00251         }
00252 
00253         SoundDescPtr desc = NiNew SoundDesc(convertedFilename);
00254         desc->mode = FMOD_LOOP_NORMAL | FMOD_3D | FMOD_HARDWARE;
00255         m_tResourcesSounds.SetAt(type, desc);
00256         return true;
00257 }
